overview:
Rahul Varshneya advises individuals, businesses and organizations on how to build mobile experiences that foster new connections with consumers. He is the co-founder of Arkenea Technologies, delivering consulting and technology services in the mobile and web domain.

Rahul’s fourteen-year technology, media, communications and digital marketing experience helps in designing engaging strategies for individuals, businesses and organizations that seek to drive their business or idea forward through cutting edge mobile experiences. His hands-on approach with assignments has helped brands achieve 1-million-plus downloads in the app store. Rahul’s passion for creating value for customers helps transform one-line client briefs into successful products.

Rahul co-founded two entrepreneurial ventures in the earlier years, namely Emaginative Technologies (web application development, 1998) and Moksha Art (online fine art gallery, 2005) and he also founded The PR School (2010), the world’s first free online public relations training school.

Apart from his entrepreneurial ventures, Rahul has worked with India’s leading media houses: A&M Magazine, NDTV and Times Now; financial services communications agency: Concept PR; and AEGON Religare Life Insurance as the Corporate Communications and Digital Marketing Head.

Rahul has been quoted in India’s Bloomberg UTV business and news channel and his company has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, among others.
